## Stern Brocot Curve

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
fractions = readRDS('./man/data/stern_brocot.rds')
```

Number of Samples: `r fractions %>% nrow() %>% format(big.mark=',',scientific=F,trim=T)` \

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
print(plot_error_hist(fractions$error,
                      bins=21,
                      'fundamental', 
                      default_variance(),
                      'Stern-Brocot Curve'))
cat("  \n")


```
